title: Kinokoinu - Mushroom Pup Anime Reveals Promo Video, Visual, More Cast, Theme Song Artists
description: October debut also confirmed― The staff for the television anime of Kimama Aoboshi's Kinokoinu - Mushroom Pup manga unveiled the anime's promotional video, key visual, additional cast, more staff, and ending theme artist on Saturday. title: Nights with a Cat Anime's 3rd Season Debuts in December
description: Main visual, character visuals also revealed― The staff of the anime of Kyuryu Z's Nights with a Cat (Yoru wa Neko to Issho) manga revealed on Saturday that the anime's third season will debut online in December. The staff also revealed a main visual as well as character visuals for Chikuwa and Konbu. The returning cast includes Ayahi Takagaki as Kyuruga, Satoshi Hino as Fuuta-kun, and Atsumi Taneza...

title: Crunchyroll Adds 2nd Season of Megaton Musashi Anime in India
description: Anime season premiered in Japan in October 2021― Crunchyroll began streaming the second season of the television anime for Level 5's Megaton-kyū Musashi multimedia project in India on July 25. The anime's first season premiered on Tokyo MX and BS Fuji in October 2021 and aired its final episode in December 2021. The anime's second season premiered in October 2022 on Tokyo MX. title: TMS Entertainment Streams N. American Premiere of Big X, More Anime on YouTube for 60th Anniversary
description: Also: Sonic X, Super Dimension Century Orguss, Lupin the IIIrd― TMS Entertainment announced on Friday that it will stream various anime on its official YouTube channel to commemorate its 60th anniversary. The teaser reveals more cast members for the film, and also reveals its January 31, 2025 opening date. title: 'Please Put Them On, Takamine-san!' Risque Comedy Manga Gets TV Anime

(Haite Kudasai, Takamine-san) manga is inspiring a television anime adaptation. Kadokawa unveiled a teaser visual for the anime, but did not reveal other information. title: Netflix Streams Oshi no Ko Season 2 in India
description: Streaming service releases each episode of anime as it airs in Japan― Netflix began streaming the second Oshi no Ko anime season in India on July 3. The streaming service is releasing each episode of the anime as it airs in Japan. The season premiered on July 3 at 11:00 p.m. (10:00 a.m. EDT) on Tokyo MX and over 29 other channels throughout Japan. It is also streaming simultaneously on the ABEMA ser...

title: Through the Lens Entertainment, Fangoria to Produce Films Based on Junji Ito's 'Bloodsucking Darkness,' 'Mystery of the Haunted House' Manga
description: Aditya Chand, Jay Van Hoy, Junji Ito, more serve as producers― Pan-Asian film and entertainment studio Through the Lens Entertainment and horror brand Fangoria Studios are collaborating to produce films based on works by Junji Ito. title: Digimon Adventure Anime Streams 25th Anniversary Promo Video
description: Video features reanimated scenes from 1999 anime set to Kouji Wada's original theme song "Butter-fly"― The official Digimon Partners YouTube channel began streaming the 25th anniversary Digimon Adventure anime promotional video on Thursday. title: Peleliu Gaiden Manga to End in 4th Volume
description: Spinoff series debuted in 2022―  The third compiled book volume of Kazuyoshi Takeda's Peleliu Gaiden manga revealed on Monday that the manga, which is a spinoff of the Peleliu: Guernica of Paradise (Peleliu: Rakuen no Guernica) manga, will end with the fourth compiled book volume around July 2025. title: Odekake Kozame Anime Reveals New Series is Anime Film
description: New anime series for Penguin Box's manga first announced on May 10― Kadokawa announced that the new series for Penguin Box's Odekake Kozame (Little Shark's Outings) manga will be an anime film, and revealed the second teaser visual and a special video on Thursday. title: Mikihisa Konishi's Petals of Reincarnation Action Manga Gets TV Anime
description: Manga about talented "Returners" who are reincarnated historical figures launched in May 2014― Mag Garden announced on Thursday that Mikihisa Konishi's Reincarnation no Kaben (Petals of Reincarnation) manga is inspiring a television anime. Mag Garden unveiled a visual for the anime, as well as a 10th anniversary promotional video for the manga, but did not reveal any other information for the anime....

title: Terminator Zero Anime Unveils New Trailer

title: Your Lie in April London Stage Musical Run Cut Short to August 11
description: Musical version of Naoshi Arakawa's manga had been previously scheduled to run until September 21― The stage musical version of Naoshi Arakawa's Your Lie in April manga, running at The Harold Pinter Theatre in London's West End, will end its run on Sunday August 11, not on September 21 as previously announced. title: Undead Unluck Anime Gets 1-Hour Special in Winter 2025

title: Crunchyroll Holds 1-Day Screenings of The Concierge, trapezium Films in N. America in September
description: The Concierge screens on September 11, trapezium on September 18― Crunchyroll announced on Wednesday that it will screen The Concierge and trapezium anime films for one-day engagements in North America, with The Concierge screening on September 11, and trapezium screening on September 18. title: Live-Action ACMA:Game Film's Trailer Reveals More Cast
